import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; const ProductDetails = () => { const [produc, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchProductDetail = async() => { const {data} = await axios.get('/products/:id') } }) return (

Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of stock'}
) } export default ProductDetails;
